response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing exceptional solutions to our esteemed clients. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 15000}
